channel.title: Writing a new quest. (Hiring for help!)
channel.description:
[left]Ok Mopar users,
We've finally gotten our feet off the ground, and we need a quest to keep our questers happy! We'll always hire new people (unless we get too many) to help us with our quests.
Quest Name: [b]~Seek of Saradomin~[/b]
Quest story line...
[b] A young man, in search for the love of his life needs some help finding this mystic "she". What he doesn't know, is that he will be searching for something a little more than just a girl. Will he find his true love? Or fall in the process? Along the line, he seeks guidence in the lord; Saradomin. This seems to be one of the most challenging quests ever existing...[/b]
This is up to the coders we hire. If you want a permanent job, please make sure you have good coding skills. PM me for a permanent or temporary job![/left]

item.title: Writing a new quest. (Hiring for help!)
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[left]Ok Mopar users,

                  We've finally gotten our feet off the ground, and we need a quest to keep our questers happy!

We’ll always hire new people (unless we get too many) to help us with our quests.

Quest Name: ~Seek of Saradomin~

Quest story line…

[b] A young man, in search for the love of his life
 needs some help finding this mystic "she".
 What he doesn't know, is that he will
 be searching for something a little more
 than just a girl. Will he find his true love?
 Or fall in the process? Along the line, he
 seeks guidence in the lord; Saradomin.
 This seems to be one of the most challenging
 quests ever existing...[/b]

This is up to the coders we hire. If you want a permanent job, please make sure you have good coding skills. PM me for a permanent or temporary job![/left]

Read full topic
